name: Dawn of Civilization
overview: Dawn of Civilization is a 1 - 4 player strategy game for the 8-bit Atari. Each player controls a small stone age tribe at the dawn of civilization. Played on a 12 x 12 grid, each turn a player can build legions, cultivate food, or manage farms. Tribes can also be in direct conflict with each other. If tribes become too large for food production, starvation will occur. The goal is to have the largest tribe at the end of the player determined number of turns. Players can be assign to human or computer control.
